title: Ubuntu 23.04 share screen not working
body:
**Describe the bug**
Using the snap version of Teams-for-linux the share screen is not working.
When I click on the share button then "Screen, Window or tab..", I’m getting this popup
![Screenshot from 2023-10-26 11-19-27](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/19902259/d1b45e43-8c8f-4501-97f7-a238a7531837)

If I click on the the first button, (others doesn’t seems to do anything )
![Screenshot from 2023-10-26 11-43-50](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/19902259/0d8dda60-b3b8-4c79-b1eb-33b27665b0bb)


I’m getting this error message.
![Screenshot from 2023-10-26 11-22-41](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/19902259/0e09f50d-7e1b-488f-81d5-85188601a68f)


I have tested separately the camera it is working, I don’t understand why the screen sharing is trying to access the camera...

As said above I’m using the snap version, i have tested all of the above with all the permissions available in the UI.
![Screenshot from 2023-10-26 11-21-37](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/19902259/4546e9d7-58f3-4cb4-9811-d6fa58e5224f)


Here is my Ubuntu distribution version details, running on a laptop with an external monitor connected to it.
![Screenshot from 2023-10-26 11-22-04](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/19902259/bc0dab65-9556-401a-a1df-1cb9b29550a2)


**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. On Ubuntu 23.04 install the snap package of Teams-for-linux
2. After login to teams start a "Meeting Now" from the calendar
3. Click on the "Share" button then "Screen, Window or tab.."
4. See error message shared above

**Expected behavior**
I’m expecting to be able to choose to share one of the monitor I have.


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: [Ubunut 23.04]
 - Installation package [snap]
 - Version [1.3.14] ( not tested with other version )

**Additional context**
It is working fine with the Debian package version 1.3.14.
